mapper.select: select PATIENT_ID from patient_list_list where LIST_ID = #{LIST_ID}

select patient_list.STABLE_ID as id, patient_list.NAME as name, patient_list.DESCRIPTION as description, cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_IDENTIFIER as study_id, (select STABLE_ID from patient inner join patient_list_list on patient.INTERNAL_ID = patient_list_list.PATIENT_ID where patient_list_list.LIST_ID = patient_list.STABLE_ID) as patient_ids from patient_list inner join cancer_study on cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_ID = patient_list.CANCER_STUDY_ID where patient_list.STABLE_ID in #{item}
